Xiuhua Wang

Address: Rm A345, Mingde Building, the School of Cyber Science and Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology, Wuhan, Hubei, China.

Email: xiuhuawang AT hust DOT edu DOT cn

Xiuhua Wang is an Associate Professor of the School of Cyber Science and Engineering, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. She received her Ph.D. degree from the Department of Information Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, under the supervision of Prof. Sherman S. M. Chow in 2020. She received her master's degree from the Department of Computer Science, City University of Hong Kong in 2014.

Opening:

1. My lab is opening for self-motivated master or PhD students with strong interest(s) in my research areas.

2. If you are an HUST (undergraduate/master) student and would like to explore cyber security with me, drop me an email.
